gems.text:
Problems which are frequently explored in modern life are addiction, disinformation, polarization, climate change, and more. But what if many of these problems are actually symptoms of the same meta-problem, or meta-crisis? And what if a key leverage point for intervening in this meta-crisis is improving our collective capacity to problem-solve?

Daniel Schmachtenberger guides us through his vision for a new form of global coordination to help us address our global existential challenges. Daniel is a founding member of the Consilience Project, aimed at facilitating new forms of collective intelligence and governance to strengthen open societies. 

https://your-undivided-attention.simplecast.com/episodes/a-problem-well-stated-is-half-solved-0nI8m2G3

metalink.description: Jun 25, 2021 ... We've explored many different problems on Your Undivided Attention ‚Äî addiction, disinformation, polarization, climate change, and more.
metalink.title: A Problem Well-Stated is Half-Solved | Your Undivided Attention

gems.text:
The P2P Lab is an interdisciplinary research collective focused on the commons.

Which aims to:
 -  strive for integrative insights on the open-source technologies and practices;
 -  write, edit and publish articles, reports, and books on a diverse range of topics we investigate;
 - organise events for reflection and action as well as to educate people about critical and creative tools for society-changing.

The P2P Lab designs and implements projects using participatory and community-based methods and practices. We forward research and knowledge through the creation of spaces for creative resistance and commons-based alternatives.

https://www.p2plab.gr/en/

gems.text:
Ground News is a platform that makes it easy to compare news sources, read between the lines of media bias and break free from algorithms.

The Ground News rating system adds context and transparency to every news story. Readers from all walks of life can conveniently identify media bias, check source credibility, and view ownership data for news outlets around the world.

The bias and factuality ratings are determined using three independent news monitoring organizations: All Sides, Ad Fontes Media, and Media Bias Fact Check. The ownership categories were researched and developed by Ground News. 
 https://ground.news

metalink.description: Top Stories from around you and around the world. Compare how different news publishers frame the same news
metalink.title: Ground News

gems.text:
https://www.khanacademy.org/

A personalized learning resource for all ages
Khan Academy offers practice exercises, instructional videos, and a personalized learning dashboard that empower learners to study at their own pace in and outside of the classroom. We tackle math, science, computing, history, art history, economics, and more, including K-14 and test preparation (SAT, Praxis, LSAT) content. We focus on skill mastery to help learners establish strong foundations, so there's no limit to what they can learn next!

metalink.description: Learn for free about math, art, computer programming, economics, physics, chemistry, biology, medicine, finance, history, and more. Khan Academy is a nonprofit with the mission of providing a free, world-class education for anyone, anywhere.

gems.text:
https://learningequality.org/kolibri/

Kolibri is an adaptable set of open solutions specially developed to support learning for the half of the world without Internet access. Centered around an offline-first learning platform that runs on a variety of low-cost and legacy devices, the Kolibri Product Ecosystem includes a curricular tool, a library of open educational resources, and a toolkit of resources to support training and implementation in formal, informal, and non-formal learning environments.

gems.text:
PubHubs is the name for a new Dutch community network, based on public values. PubHubs stands for Public Hubs. It is open and transparent and protects data of the network‚Äôs participants. PubHubs aims to connect people, in different hubs, such as your family, sports club, school class, museum, local library, neighborhood, or municipality. In each such hub, a relevant part of one‚Äôs own identity plays a role. PubHubs focuses on reliable information, if necessary with digital signatures, and on trusted communication, if necessary with guarantees of the identity of participants. 

https://pubhubs.net/en/

metalink.description: PubHubs - Sociaal platform gebaseerd op publieke waarden.

gems.text:
Political Economy in Web 3.0
 

Holochain, https://www.holochain.org  
Holochain helps by creating an alternative to the dominant centralized systems of the Internet, protecting our ability to make our own choices, and giving trustworthy information we can act on. We call this 'digital agency', and we believe it will give us the power to face today's complex problems, together.

Authur Brock, the lead designer of holochain. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XH2dV33shxE

Maton Fields?  

Tracheopteryx is the founder of Coordinape, the intersubjective coordination tool. Coordinape allows DAO contributors to collectively reward each other as an alternate‚Äîand more elegant‚Äîmeans of compensating work & value.

Jordan Hall, Web3: Tech vs the Human Condition.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o32x9qx3Umo 
Jordan discusses the possible trajectory of Web3, how well developed the space is, and also the problems that are becoming ever more apparent. In particular how the early hopes that Web3 might be able to find tech solutions to the eternal problems of human beings coordinating together, seem to be failing.

Barra

metalink.description: Holochain delivers beyond the promises of blockchain by providing a lightweight, secure and versatile framework for everyday distributed apps.
metalink.title: Holochain | App framework with P2P networking

gems.text:
Solarpunk is a genre of speculative fiction that is also its own distinguished aesthetic, focusing mainly on renewable energy, living in harmony with nature, and the better future envisioned through both. Solarpunk also emphasizes handcrafted wares (as opposed to mass-produced products) and community. The 'punk' in Solarpunk comes from the genre's anti-authoritarian and anti-capitalist nature, as well as its strong focus on community and prefigurative politics, which separates it from aesthetics like Cyberprep.

https://aesthetics.fandom.com/wiki/Solarpunk

metalink.description: Solarpunk is a genre of speculative fiction that is also its own distinguished aesthetic, focusing mainly on renewable energy, living in harmony with nature, and the better future envisioned through both. gems.text:
The P2P Foundation was conceived to help people, organizations and governments transition towards commons-based approaches to society through co-creating an open knowledge commons and a resilient, sustainable human network.

The P2P Foundation (officially, The Foundation for P2P Alternatives) is a non-profit organization and global network dedicated to advocacy and research of commons-oriented peer to peer (P2P) dynamics in society. 

https://p2pfoundation.net/the-p2p-foundation/about-the-p2p-foundation

section.title: Digital Governance and Democracy

gems.text:
https://www.landano.io/about/

Landano allows property owners to manage land records for their real estate property via an easy-to-use, decentralized app (dApp) and our Open Cadastral Map initiative.

Landano is a true, Africa-focused "RealFi" solution that is informed by on-the-ground requirements from pilot projects in Ghana, Mozambique, and Kenya.

Land records are notarized on the Cardano blockchain as NFT documents. Using a shared, auditable ledger like the Cardano blockchain improves transparency and prevents fraud. Combined with standards-based record-keeping features, Landano land records can be used as trustworthy DeFi primitives for mortgages, business loans, leases, etc..

metalink.description:

Some people refer to sociocracy as Dynamic Self-Governance or simply Dynamic Governance.

gems.text:

We act as an ‚Äúengine‚Äù for the commons by supporting partner projects that build tech to share, and connecting them through thematic cohorts excited to learn from each other, too!  We document these social and economic techniques to enable groups to set up with more confidence ‚Äì by plugging themselves into existing networks of practice, and by using tried and true methods.

gems.text:
https://metacurrency.org The MetaCurrency Project
Developing tools and platforms for open sourcing the next economy. Metacurrency.org seeks to identify and formalize healthy patterns of flow through symbol systems (ex, tokens, badges, tickets, standards) we call current-sees. We choose to focus on Currencies as we consider them as the foundational building blocks from which all complex systems are built.

metalink.description: We are building the technological tools and social patterns and practices to enable the next economy ‚Äî one that is distributed, equitable, and regenerative.
metalink.title: Our Philosophy

gems.text:
https://valueflo.ws/ 

A vocabulary for the distributed economic networks of the next economy Valueflows (VF) is a standard vocabulary (ontology) to coordinate the creation, distribution, and exchange of economic resources.

The vocabulary will work for any kind of economic activity, but the focus is to facilitate groups experimenting with solidarity / cooperative / collaborative / small business ecosystem / commons based peer production / any transitional economies. We want to enable internetworking among many different software projects for resource planning and accounting within fractal networks of people and groups. Specifically, we want to support resource flows connecting many software applications.
https://newpublic.org/

metalink.description: New_ Public aims to inspire and connect designers and technologists to build more flourishing, public friendly digital spaces.
metalink.title: New_ Public - For Better Digital Public Spaces

gems.text: PublicSpaces is a unique coalition of various public organizations, such as public broadcasters, heritage institutions, festivals, libraries, museums and education. The  PublicSpaces coalition is working together on a new digital ecosystem based on public values. In which the users are not seen as commercial objects or as useful data, but as equal partners who have a common public interest.  https://publicspaces.net

metalink.description: Door PublicSpaces zijn in 2026 zijn alle privacy officers en CTO‚Äôs van publieke organisaties in Nederland op de hoogte van alternatieve digitale instrumenten gebaseerd op publieke waarden.
metalink.title: Wij willen het internet terug - PublicSpaces

gems.text: The Cities Coalition for Digital Rights, launched by the Cities of Amsterdam, Barcelona and New York in November 2018 and now with a membership of over 50 cities worldwide, is a network of cities helping each other in the greenfield of digital rights based policy-making. The Coalition is committed to promoting and defending digital rights in urban context through city action, to resolve common digital challenges and work towards legal, ethical and operational frameworks to advance human rights in digital environments.  https://citiesfordigitalrights.org/thecoalition

gems.text: (GrDP) Green Domestic Product,  alternative to GDP.   is an index of economic growth with the environmental consequences of that growth factored into a country's conventional GDP. Green GDP monetizes the loss of biodiversity, and accounts for costs caused by climate change. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Green_gross_domestic_product

https://www.systemicpeace.org
The Center for Systemic Peace (CSP) was founded in 1997. It is engaged in innovative research on the problem of political violence within the structural context of the dynamic global system, that is, global systems analysis. The Center supports scientific research and quantitative analysis in many issue areas related to the fundamental problems of violence in both human relations and societal-systemic development processes.

Solarpunk is a genre of speculative fiction that is also its own distinguished aesthetic, focusing mainly on renewable energy, living in harmony with nature, and the better future envisioned through both. Solarpunk also emphasizes handcrafted wares (as opposed to mass-produced products) and community. The 'punk' in Solarpunk comes from the genre's anti-authoritarian and anti-capitalist nature, as well as its strong focus on community and prefigurative politics, which separates it from aesthetics like Cyberprep.

https://aesthetics.fandom.com/wiki/Solarpunk

gems.text:
Normality Principle of Corrections :

The punishment is the restriction of liberty; no other rights have been removed by the sentencing court. Therefore the sentenced offender has all the same rights as all other who live.

No-one shall serve their sentence under stricter circumstances than necessary for the security in the community. Therefore offenders shall be placed in the lowest possible security regime.

During the serving of a sentence, life inside will resemble life outside as much as possible.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Normality_principle
